DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study ass serum urine concentration salmeterol inhalation 100 microgram salmeterol one dose . Furthermore , evaluate difference three group : 10 healthy men , 10 male asthmatic subject 10 male elite athlete asthma .
DOC.criteria: Physiciandiagnosed asthma positive reversibility challenge test . Informed consent . Age 1845 year . Sex : male . Asthma classify mild moderate accord GINA guideline . Used beta2agonist minimum 12 month . Smokers exsmokers smoke history 10 pack year . Respiratory tract infection within last 2 week prior study day . Subjects chronic disease asthma and/or allergy . Allergy towards study medicine . Use beta2agonist 10 day prior study day .
